actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1014.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #184 (351-6).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Friendship Hill National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1014) Establishes the Friendship Hill National Historic Site, in Pennsylvania, to commemorate the Jeffersonian Period of American history. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary for development purposes, but not to exceed $100,000. Authorizes to be appropriated for fiscal year 1979 and succeeding fiscal years such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Friendship Hill National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
